Intro World.name: Intro World
Intro World.description: A familiar yet unsettling version of your own home, where reality starts to bend and the journey begins.

Elemental Conflux.name: Elemental Conflux
Elemental Conflux.description: A grand monastery at the intersection of elemental planes, where spiritual and physical mastery over the forces of nature is essential for survival.

Harmonic Nexus.name: Harmonic Nexus
Harmonic Nexus.description: A surreal, rhythm-driven world where music shapes reality, and the power of sound and rhythm guides every move.

Whimsical Realm.name: Whimsical Realm
Whimsical Realm.description: A bizarre, dreamlike land where thoughts shape reality. Creativity is the key to solving puzzles and navigating surreal environments.
